title: Getting Started with DataStax Astra DB
description:
Example REST API in Java showing how to connect to and query DataStax AstraDB databases, Check out DataStax Examples for more code samples - https://www.datastax.com/examples

Github REPO FOR THE DEMO:
https://github.com/DataStax-Examples/getting-started-with-astra-ui
https://github.com/DataStax-Examples/getting-started-with-astra-java

ABOUT DATASTAX DEVELOPERS
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache CassandraÂ©.  Create an account on https://academy.datastax.com to watch our free online courses, tutorials, and more.

space information in it and then all the certificates so it can set up TLS and that this is the secure part of a secure bundle is that this stuff is all set up for you if you had to do this manually you would not want to use this but this connect bundle has everything all locked up for you so you have it ready to rock and so from this point I think it's the matter just going out and giving it a
